author: rickmcguire
msg: GERONIMO-5133 Geroinimo versions of the specs should pick up the additions made to the service mix versions of the bundles.
NOTE:  The unit tests are broken when running on java 6 because the RI activation classes are
getting picked up instead.  The build will need some corrections to get the jar on the endorsed
path and also the code/test cases will need some adjustment so that they are in agreement
with what the RI is returning.
